content:
Vaccines save lives  Hopefully HCW can assuage public fear and anxiety regarding this vaccine  so we can finally move forward #VaccinesSaveLives 
#CovidVaccines #PfizerBioNTech 

**Coronavirus Update 116: Pfizer COVID 19 Vaccine Explained**
date: Coronavirus Update 116: Pfizer COVID 19 Vaccine Explained (Biontech)Professor Roger Seheult, MD discusses the Pfizer / Biontech COVID-19 mRNA vaccine: How it works and what we know about the safety and efficacy at this time. ...youtube.com
